column1: Comma in error msg is substituted with ^ symbol
For separating arguments in error args | symbol is used

column3: ERROR MSG
Syntax error on token "/"^ delete this token
Syntax error on token "f"^ invalid Modifiers
Syntax error on token "fl"^ invalid Modifiers
Syntax error on token "flme"^ invalid Modifiers
Syntax error on token "fram"^ invalid Modifiers
Syntax error on token "frame"^ invalid Modifiers
Syntax error on token "if"^ delete this token
Syntax error on token "int"^ delete this token
Syntax error on token "void"^ delete this token
Syntax error on token "{"^ ( expected
Syntax error^ insert ")" to complete Expression
Syntax error^ insert ")" to complete MethodDeclaration
Syntax error^ insert ";" to complete BlockStatements
Syntax error^ insert ";" to complete FieldDeclaration
Syntax error^ insert ";" to complete MethodDeclaration
Syntax error^ insert ";" to complete ReturnStatement
Syntax error^ insert ";" to complete Statement
Syntax error^ insert "AssignmentOperator Expression" to complete Assignment
Syntax error^ insert "AssignmentOperator Expression" to complete Expression
Syntax error^ insert "}" to complete MethodBody
